unnormalised: Hey everyone! Return policies are so crucial, right?
normalised: Hey everyone! Return policies are so crucial, right?

unnormalised: Especially when buying clothes online, like a festive saree for Onam!
normalised: Especially when buying clothes online, like a festive saree for Onam!

unnormalised: Has anyone faced hassles returning something?
normalised: Has anyone faced hassles returning something?

unnormalised: I once ordered a kurta from Jaipur and it was completely different colour!
normalised: I once ordered a kurta from Jaipur and it was completely different colour!

unnormalised: Thankfully, they had a good policy.
normalised: Thankfully, they had a good policy.

unnormalised: Returns should be smooth as biryani being served in Hyderabad.
normalised: Returns should be smooth as biryani being served in Hyderabad.

unnormalised: Otherwise, no customer will come back, yaar!
normalised: Otherwise, no customer will come back, yaar!
